title: New Life Live: October 28, 2022
description:
Topics: Addictions, Marijuana, Boundaries, Grief, Dating, Childhood Trauma, Forgiveness  Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Milan Yerkovich Caller Questions: How do we do tough love with our 19yo son who lives with us and smokes pot? He has been charged with a misdemeanor.  My abusive husband died 7yrs ago, but I can’t get past being terrified of men. Where do I go from here? 

The post New Life Live: October 28, 2022 appeared first on New Life.
content:encoded:
Topics: Addictions, Marijuana, Boundaries, Grief, Dating, Childhood Trauma, Forgiveness 
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Alice Benton, Milan Yerkovich

Caller Questions:

  1. How do we do tough love with our 19yo son who lives with us and smokes pot? He has been charged with a misdemeanor. 
  2. My abusive husband died 7yrs ago, but I can’t get past being terrified of men. Where do I go from here? 
  3. Although I can minister to others and God delivered me from drugs and abuse from my prostitute mom, I still don’t believe God cares for me. 

Suggested Resources:
Take Your Life Back
Understanding and Loving Your Child who Smokes Pot
How We Love

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
